about_the_game:
Working hard or hardly working?

Trimmer Tycoon's Improx Skin Bundle includes five brand new customer skins. The skins are based on Improx Games's founders. Spice up the game with even more variety and colorfulness! The new characters will be added into all customer tiers.

This pack includes the following skins:
- Jussi the Coder
- Oski the Manager
- Max the Musician
- Miika the Artist
- Lauri the Animator

This DLC is meant as a way to support us with little donations while getting awesome content in return. Please see the other DLCs (Holiday Skin Bundle, Sports Skin Bundle and Fantasy Skin Bundle) for different money amounts and even more awesome skins.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: Mac OS X 10.8+
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 2.0) capabilities
